summary: Project to manage cases with MRN-based lookup: when adding a case, if MRN already exists, alert user and autofill patient demographics from existing case data.
architectural_notes: Support MRN-based case lookup during case creation and use matching record data to prefill patient demographics fields.

existing_features.title: When creating a new case, detect if the entered MRN matches an existing case in the cases list and (1) alert the user and (2) automatically populate MRN, date of birth, patient first name, patient last name, species, breed, and sex from the most recent existing case with that MRN.

new_feature_requests.summary: On case creation, if MRN already exists, alert the user and auto-populate MRN, DOB, patient first/last name, species, breed, and sex from the previous entry.

projectName: Alert and auto-fill demographics when MRN already exists
